description: Try our easy to follow Farfalle Pasta With Chunky Tomato Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Farfalle Pasta With Chunky Tomato Sauce
name: Farfalle Pasta With Chunky Tomato Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g can organic chunky tomato soup

recipeInstructions.text: While the pasta is cooking, heat the remaining tablespoon of butter in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the shallots and sauté, stirring frequently, until golden, about five minutes. Remove shallots from the pan and set aside in a small bowl. Wipe the pan with a paper towel and return to the stovetop. Turn heat up to medium-high, add a bit of olive
